message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm happy to pay $85 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm still hoping to get it closer to my budget. How about $90? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure you'll be happy with the sale.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get it closer to your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $98. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know what you think!
